section.title: Constructing a FlyMine query
section.para: The following points provide a basic outline of the steps involved in building a query with links to where you can find more detailed information:

listitem.para: Choose the starting point for your query either from the classes displayed (which have been divided into biologically meaniful categories) or by selecting the 'List all classes' link. This will take you to the main query builder page. See Choosing a starting point for more details.
In the model browser of the query builder, browse to the classes and fields you are interested in. See The model browser for more details.

Select the classes and/or fields you wish to constrain using the -> constrain arrows. Specify your constraints in the right hand constraints list.See Applying constraints to your query for more details.

Select the classes and/or fields you wish to show in the results output using the "show" buttons. The classes/fields selected will appear in the output fields list. See Selecting what to show in your results for more details.
Press 'show results' to view your results in the results page. See Viewing results for more details.
